org.jcvi.jillion.shared.fasta

Class AbstractFastaRecordBuilder<T,S extends Sequence<T>,F extends FastaRecord<T,S>,B extends AbstractFastaRecordBuilder<T,S,F,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.shared.fasta.AbstractFastaRecordBuilder<T,S,F,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of element in the sequence.
    S - the type of Sequence
    F - the type of FastaRecord
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NucleotideFastaRecordBuilder, ProteinFastaRecordBuilder, QualityFastaRecordBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractFastaRecordBuilder<T,S extends Sequence<T>,F extends FastaRecord<T,S>,B extends AbstractFastaRecordBuilder<T,S,F,B>>
extends Object
    AbstractFastaRecordBuilder is an abstract class that handles all the boilerplate code for building a FastaRecord.
    Author:
    dkatzel

      • comment

        public B comment(String comment)
        Add an optional comment to this fasta record. This will be the value returned by Defline.getComment(). Calling this method more than once will cause the last value to overwrite the previous value.
        Parameters:
        comment - the comment for this fasta record; if this value is null, then there is no comment.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withId

        public B withId(String id)
        Add an optional comment to this fasta record. This will be the value returned by Defline.getComment(). Calling this method more than once will cause the last value to overwrite the previous value.
        Parameters:
        comment - the comment for this fasta record; if this value is null, then there is no comment.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withSequence

        public B withSequence(S sequence)

      • build

        public F build()
        Create a new instance of FastaRecord using the given parameters so far.
        Returns:
        a new instance of FastaRecord.

      • createNewInstance

        protected abstract F createNewInstance(String id,
                                       S sequence,
                                       String comment)
        Create a new instance of FastaRecord using the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the fasta record; can not be null.
        sequence - the sequence of the fasta record; can not be null.
        comment - the optional comment of the fasta record. May be null or contain white spaces. If the comment is null, then there is no comment.
        Returns:
        a new FastaRecord instance; can not be null.
